vclaim: A video shows a genuine news interview with Alfredo Rivera, supposedly the flight attendant who duct-taped an unruly passenger to his seat during a Frontier Airlines flight in July 2021.
title: Is Alfredo Rivera the Flight Attendant Who Duct-Taped a Passenger?
subtitle: We can't confirm if this passenger truly smelled like Marlboro cigarettes, Everclear alcohol and regret.
author: Dan Evon
